languages.text: {n}Нож, зажатый в тонких пальцах, с хрустом выводит линии прямо на дорогом дереве стола. Среди собравшихся пробегает взволнованный шепоток. Напряженные взгляды прикованы к безобидной дурно заточенной железяке, лежащей в пальцах ткача Кровавой паутины.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Нож, зажатый в тонких пальцах, начинает выводить линии в промежутках среди пышных явств. При виде культистки, режущей миниатюрный лабиринт прямо на столе, над собравшимися на раут пробегает шепоток. Откуда-то доносится ехидный смешок.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, barely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Нож, зажатый в тонких пальцах, с хрустом выводит линии прямо на дорогом дереве стола. Среди собравшихся пробегает взволнованный шепоток. Напряженные взгляды прикованы к безобидной дурно заточенной железяке, лежащей в пальцах ткача Кровавой паутины.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, scarcely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}

{n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, scarcely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}

{n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, barely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}
{n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A murmur runs through the crowd. From somewhere amongst it, you hear a caustic laugh.{/n}

{n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, barely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}

{n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, barely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}

{n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, barely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aferrando el cuchillo, empieza a tallar líneas sobre la lujosa mesa de madera. Un murmullo recorre la multitud. Sus miradas nerviosas están fijas en el utensilio de metal, en principio inofensivo, en la mano de la cultista de la Red Sanguinolenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, barely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aferrando el cuchillo, empieza a tallar líneas sobre la lujosa mesa de madera. Un murmullo recorre la multitud. Sus miradas nerviosas están fijas en el utensilio de metal, en principio inofensivo, en la mano de la cultista de la Red Sanguinolenta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼女はナイフを握りしめ、高価な木製のテーブルの天板に線を彫り始める。群衆の間に緊張したざわめきが走る。彼らの緊張した視線は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの魔女団が手にする見た目には無害で、ほとんど研がれていない金属製の道具に注がれている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, barely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女はナイフを握りしめ、高価な木製のテーブルの天板に線を彫り始める。群衆の間に緊張したざわめきが走る。彼らの緊張した視線は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの魔女団が手にする見た目には無害で、ほとんど研がれていない金属製の道具に注がれている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}她握住餐刀，在昂贵的木制桌面上雕刻起来。人群中传来了紧张的窃窃私语声，所有人的目光都死死地盯着绮贝菈手中看似人畜无害、几乎没有任何锋利之处的金属器具上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, barely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她握住餐刀，在昂贵的木制桌面上雕刻起来。人群中传来了紧张的窃窃私语声，所有人的目光都死死地盯着绮贝菈手中看似人畜无害、几乎没有任何锋利之处的金属器具上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie greift nach ihrem Messer und ritzt Linien in die teure hölzerne Tischplatte. Ein nervöses Raunen geht durch die Menge. Ihre angespannten Blicke ruhen auf dem scheinbar harmlosen Metallutensil in der Hand der Kultistin des Blutgesponnenen Netzes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, barely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie greift nach ihrem Messer und ritzt Linien in die teure hölzerne Tischplatte. Ein nervöses Raunen geht durch die Menge. Ihre angespannten Blicke ruhen auf dem scheinbar harmlosen Metallutensil in der Hand der Kultistin des Blutgesponnenen Netzes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elle se saisit du couteau et se met à graver des lignes sur la table en bois précieux. Un murmure nerveux parcourt aussitôt l'assemblée. Tendus à l'extrême, tous les regards sont rivés sur l'ustensile de métal d'apparence inoffensive, dont la lame est à peine aiguisée, dans la main de la tisseuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, barely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle se saisit du couteau et se met à graver des lignes sur la table en bois précieux. Un murmure nerveux parcourt aussitôt l'assemblée. Tendus à l'extrême, tous les regards sont rivés sur l'ustensile de métal d'apparence inoffensive, dont la lame est à peine aiguisée, dans la main de la tisseuse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bıçağı kavramasıyla birlikte pahalı ahşap masanın üzerinde hatlar oymaya başlıyor. Kalabalığın içinden endişeli bir homurtu yükseliyor. Gergin bakışları, Kanipi Ağı tarikatçısının elindeki zararsız görünümlü, doğru düzgün bilenmemiş metal mutfak aletine kilitleniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping the knife, she begins to carve lines right into the expensive wooden tabletop. A nervous murmur runs through the crowd. Their tense gazes are locked on the harmless-looking, barely sharpened metal utensil in the hand of the cultist of the Bloodspun Web.{/n}
